tr.td:
Elements defined in Ancestors:header, dispensingOrganizationOrDevice[x], dispenseLocation, receiver[x], relatedRequest, medication, dispensedQuantity, timeOfDispensation, substitution, dosageInstructions, comment
Medication dispensation model
Instances of this logical model can be the target of a Reference

description.value: Obligations for the logical model for medication dispense.

short.value: Medication dispensation model

definition.value: Logical model for medication dispensation (based on request or independently)

short.value: Header level metadata about the dispense

definition.value: Header level metadata about the dispense

short.value: Patient who the medication was prescribed to. [Used for searching]

definition.value: Patient/subject information
Resource authoring details

short.value: The person who dispensed the product, and takes the responsibility of the dispensation or declining the dispense. [Used for searching]

definition.value: Author by whom the resource was/were authored. Multiple authors could be provided.

short.value: The time of recording the dispense or declining the request. [Used for searching]

definition.value: Date and time of the issuing the document/resource by its author.

short.value: Date and time of the last update to the resource

definition.value: Date and time of the last update to the document/information

short.value: Status of the dispense. In case of declining a dispense, the status should be 'declined'. [Used for searching]

definition.value: Status of the resource

short.value: Reason for the current status of dispensation, for example the reason why the dispensation was made invalid

definition.value: Reason for the current status of the resource.
Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.
Business version of the resource.

short.value: Business identifier(s) for the dispense. [Used for searching]

definition.value: Business identifier(s) for the dispense. [Used for searching]

short.value: Dispensing organization or device

definition.value: Dispensing organization or device

short.value: Location of dispense

definition.value: Location of dispense

short.value: Identification of the person who received the dispensed medication, especially when it was not the patient

definition.value: Identification of the person who received the dispensed medication, especially when it was not the patient

short.value: Identifier of the prescription or prescription item the dispense is related to

definition.value: Identifier of the prescription or prescription item the dispense is related to

short.value: Exact dispensed product

definition.value: Exact dispensed product

short.value: Number of dispensed packages if the pack size is known, or number of smaller items/units

definition.value: Number of dispensed packages if the pack size is known, or number of smaller items/units

short.value: Date and time of dispensation

definition.value: Date and time of dispensation

short.value: Indicated whether substitution was made by the dispenser

definition.value: Indicated whether substitution was made by the dispenser

short.value: Indicated whether substitution was made by the dispenser

definition.value: Indicated whether substitution was made by the dispenser

short.value: What kind of substitution was made by the dispenser

definition.value: What kind of substitution was made by the dispenser

short.value: Reason why the substitution was made

definition.value: Reason why the substitution was made

short.value: Dosaging and administration instructions

definition.value: Dosaging and administration instructions

short.value: Additional information or comments

definition.value: Additional information or comments
